mapper.select: SELECT id , supplier_code AS supplierCode, supplier_name AS supplierName FROM supplier WHERE is_valid = '1' AND supplier_code IN ( SELECT supplier_code FROM apply_for_supplier WHERE STATUS = '2' AND channel_code = ( SELECT channel_code FROM user_accredit_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brand b RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT si.brand_id FROM skus RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT i.spu_code ,i.brand_id from items i inner join supplier_brand s ON s.brand_id = i.brand_id WHERE s.supplier_code=#{supplierCode} AND s.is_valid='1' AND i.is_valid='1' AND i.name=#{name} ) si ON si.spu_code = skus.spu_code WHERE skus.is_valid='1' AND skus.sku_code=#{skuCode} ) ssi ON ssi.brand_id=b.id AND b.name=#{BrandName}
